> when you quickly update the underlying data, does not really exist for contract code
This is a nice property of code which also helps with the transition process. My intuition is we won't need <@!353136597522448385> 's overlay method. Nodes can start pre-computing `codeRoot` for all contracts in parallel while the chain is running and at a particular block update all account records and replace the `codeHash` field
